short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find physical games at a hand-picked selection UK retailers with one click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search a number of UK retailer's websites for physical game deals!

Each website is queried with the search term as a URL parameter and results are opened in new tabs.
